title: Human Behaviour and Tribalism with Cody
description:
I spoke with biological anthropologist and twitter friend Cody, about the human tendency toward tribalism, and if that is necessarily a bad thing. We also speak about the naturalistic fallacy and theory of mind in chimps. Fascinating chat! 

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Human-Behaviour-and-Tribalism-with-Cody-e90jlq
Follow Cody @LTF_01; Cody's blog: https://culturologies.wordpress.com
Follow me on twitter @AndeaLynnLewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
https://www.themusiclab.org
